overview: Becks, an aspiring romance columnist decides to help her best friend Casey as he goes back home in search of his first love. As they start their journey to win back Cassieâ€™s first love, they both discover more about each other than they though they knew. With their friendship on the line, Becks now faces a dilemma: help Casey or risk opening her heart to the love of a lifetime.
title: Love in Full Swing
